ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Bag of the Tinkerers
ygData.msgSnippet: I to have only heard of the bag of the tinkerers being sold in the Sol A gnome stronghold. It is the replacement for the Box of Abukar. 100% weight
ygData.messageBody:
I to have only heard of the bag of the tinkerers being
sold in the Sol A gnome stronghold. It is the
"replacement" for the Box of Abukar. 100% weight
reduction, ALL items fit in it. It is quite possible
that some insane individual sold it back to the
merchant in Ak'Anon because he needed the cash. Next
time I'm back home I'll do a quick circuit of the
vendors and see if it has been added. Could you give a
hint to which section of the city the Merchant was in?

Additionally the quest pack you are talking about is
the Bootstrutter Framed Pack - It has 10 slots, 20-25%
weight reduction, NO DROP/LORE and a weight of 2.5
stones. I just picked one up doing the Duster V/X
quest, although I have heard it given as a reward for
the Red V quest as well.


--- Russ Wilcox <rwilcox@...> wrote:
> I found this bag available from a merchant in
> Ak'Anon for 5868plat. It has
> a capacity of 10 slots. Anybody know what this is
> about?
>
> I have seen the bag two different times however it
> is not there when I just
> checked 5 minutes ago.
>
> Unfortunately my notes do not specify *which*
> merchant in Ak'Anon but I
> believe it was in the main square of the city (both
> times).
>
> There was a quest given by warrior's guild where you
> get a 10-slot bag that
> reduces weight of carried items; having not
> completed this quest I don't
> know if this is the same bag but in any case I
> thought that quest gave a NO
> DROP.
